_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of the Warldis Instabilitie’ — twenty-five quatrains with refrain, ‘For to considder is ane pane’

CULLl510.First Lines:
This waverand warldis wretcheitnesThe failȝeand and frutles
                    busines…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Is in ȝour grace baþ crop &
                    grayneQuhilk is ane lessoun of my pane

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
This waverand warldis wretchidnesThe failȝeand and frutles
                    bissines…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Is in ȝour grace bayth crop and graynequhilk is ane
                    lessing of my pane
